tab1.text1: <TextStyle.Green>We offer a Primal Chaos server and PvP!</>

tab2.text1: This text goes into the left box

tab3.text1:
PvE Primal Chaos Rules

No Building in the Mesh or Ratholes that Require a Chair
No Meshed Structures or Turrets
No Excessive Spamming
No Blocking Caves - building in caves IS allowed, however, blocking access for drops is required
ONE Base Location (Due to Islands Lack of Base Locations)
No Blocking other Base Locations with Spam
No Stacking Dinos
No Intentional Lagging of the Server
Please Cryo Tames that are NOT Being Used (egg laying dinos are permitted)
No Caging
No Griefing other Players
Names and Dino Names must be English Characters and Reasonable (No Racism etc)
No 'Human', '123' Names
No obstructing drops unless its at your base or for a boss fight
- Some punishments will be placed on the tribe in game. Others will be placed on the individual player depending on the evidence given.
- Teaming will result in the players caught teaming being banned. Further individual or tribe punishment may also be included.
- Punishments can include warnings, character deletion, dino/structure wipe, temporary ban or permanent ban (including HWID ban).
- False reports will lead to punishment for the reporting player.

tab4.text1: <TextStyle.Green>This text goes into the top left box</>
